entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @nytimes 😂😂😂 he reacted so quickly they called him racist. Meanwhile mayor Deblasio, Ny’s health commissioner and Nancy Pelosi were telling people to ignore the coronavirus and go out about the town. Even recommended a movie. 1/3 of the cases are in Ny alone. More than any country.
